CallerMustBePool(address,address).details: Thrown when the caller is not the pool

InitiatorMustBeThis(address,address).details: Thrown when the initiator is not the expected initiator

InsufficientBalanceBeforeSwap(uint256,ui.details: Thrown when the balance before swap is insufficient

InsufficientOutputAmount(uint256,uint256.details: Thrown when the output amount is less than the minimum expected

InvalidDebtRepayAmount(uint256,uint256).details: Thrown when the debt repay amount is greater than the current debt

Bought(address,address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when a token is bought on Odos

params.tokenIn: The address of the token sold
params.tokenOut: The address of the token bought

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.details: Ensure that the contract can return the debt + premium, e.g., has      enough funds to repay and has approved the Pool to pull the total amount

params.amounts: The amounts of the flash-borrowed assets
params.assets: The addresses of the flash-borrowed assets
params.initiator: The address of the flashloan initiator
params.params: The byte-encoded params passed when initiating the flashloan
params.premiums: The fee of each flash-borrowed asset

returns._0: True if the execution of the operation succeeds, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueTokens(address).details: Emergency rescue for token stucked on this contract, as failsafe mechanism - Funds should never remain in this contract more time than during transactions - Only callable by the owner

swapDebt((address,uint256,uint256,addres.details: Swaps one type of debt to another. Therefore this methods performs the following actions in order: 1. Delegate credit in new debt 2. Flashloan in new debt 3. swap new debt to old debt 4. repay old debt

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).notice: Custom error when contract balance is insufficient for the swap

InsufficientOutput(uint256,uint256).notice: Custom error when actual output amount is less than expected

SwapFailed().notice: Custom error for failed swap with no revert reason

ADDRESSES_PROVIDER().notice: The address of the Aave PoolAddressesProvider contract

POOL().notice: The address of the Aave Pool contract

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: Executes an operation after receiving the flash-borrowed assets

swapRouter().notice: The address of the Odos Router

userdoc.notice: Odos Adapter to perform a swap of debt to another debt.*
